activeModules.description: Show active modules count and one active module in progress message.

dependencies.description: Show dependencies count in progress message.

dependenciesCount.description: Minimum dependencies count to start with. For better progress calculation. Default: 10000.

entries.description: Show entries count in progress message.

modules.description: Show modules count in progress message.

modulesCount.description: Minimum modules count to start with. For better progress calculation. Default: 5000.

percentBy.description: Collect percent algorithm. By default it calculates by a median from modules, entries and dependencies percent.

profile.description: Collect profile data for progress steps. Default: false.
